app_description: Get data-driven crop recommendations based on your soil and climate conditions. Make informed decisions for a bountiful harvest.
name: Name
provide_data: Provide your soil and climate data for personalized crop recommendations
city_not_found: City not found. Please try again.
preferences_info: Your preferences are saved locally and will be used across the app to provide a personalized experience.
api_key_required: Weather service unavailable. Please check your internet connection.
hero_description: Our advanced ML model analyzes your soil and climate conditions to recommend the perfect crops for maximum yield and profitability.
ml_model_description: Built with cutting-edge machine learning technology and trained on years of agricultural data
neural_network_description: Our model uses deep learning algorithms trained on 100,000+ crop records to identify patterns and predict optimal crops with exceptional accuracy.
data_insights_description: Analyzes 7 critical parameters including NPK levels, temperature, humidity, pH, and rainfall to provide comprehensive recommendations.
crops_description: Trained to recognize and recommend from 50+ different crop varieties
real_time_description: Instant predictions based on your current soil and weather conditions
profit_description: Maximizes your yield and revenue with market-aware recommendations
performance_description: Our model has been rigorously tested and validated across diverse agricultural regions
scientifically_validated_desc: Tested across multiple regions and seasons
transform_description: Get personalized crop recommendations based on your farm conditions in seconds.
app_title_full: Indra Dhanu Smart Crop Recommendation System
hackathon_tagline: Hackathon 2025 | Empowering Farmers with Data-Driven Decisions
ai_model_description: Discover the technology behind Indra Dhanu's intelligent crop recommendations
model_architecture_desc: Our deep learning model combines multiple neural network layers to process agricultural data
input_layer_desc: Processes 7 critical agricultural parameters: Nitrogen, Phosphorus, Potassium, Temperature, Humidity, pH, and Rainfall
hidden_layers_desc: Multiple dense layers with ReLU activation extract complex patterns and relationships from the input data
output_layer_desc: Softmax activation generates probability scores for 50+ crop varieties, ranking them by suitability
training_desc: Our model was trained on extensive agricultural datasets from multiple regions and seasons
training_records_desc: Trained on comprehensive agricultural data spanning multiple years and regions
cross_validation_desc: K-fold cross-validation ensures robust performance across different data distributions
hyperparameter_desc: Optimized learning rates, batch sizes, and regularization for maximum accuracy
real_world_testing_desc: Validated against actual farmer feedback and crop outcomes from diverse farms
advanced_features_desc: Our model incorporates cutting-edge techniques for superior crop recommendations
market_price_desc: Considers current market prices to recommend crops with maximum profit potential
seasonal_adaptation_desc: Automatically adjusts recommendations based on current season and weather patterns
yield_prediction_desc: Estimates expected yield for each recommended crop based on your specific conditions
real_time_updates_desc: Model continuously learns from new data to improve recommendations over time
get_started_desc: Use our AI model to get personalized crop recommendations for your farm today.
about_us_description: Meet the passionate team behind Indra Dhanu, working together to revolutionize agricultural technology and empower farmers with data-driven insights.
mission_description: At Indra Dhanu, we believe that technology can transform agriculture by providing farmers with intelligent, data-driven insights. Our mission is to democratize access to agricultural knowledge, helping farmers make informed decisions that increase productivity, sustainability, and profitability.
innovation_description: Continuously improving our technology to provide cutting-edge agricultural solutions
accessibility_description: Making advanced agricultural insights available to farmers worldwide
sustainability_description: Promoting environmentally responsible farming practices for future generations
contact_description: Have questions or want to collaborate? We'd love to hear from you.
